name: cocktailapi
description: This is a simple web app where a user can type in a drink they would like a recipe for and the drink name, image, and recipe will be displayed on the page.  This application uses the cocktailDB API (https://www.thecocktaildb.com/api.php) to fetch drink data based on drink name (e.g. using user input 'margarita'  will fetch www.thecocktaildb.com/api/json/v1/1/search.php?s=margarita).
